structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS
CITY-COUNTY METROPOLITAN SEWER, SEWER CONSTRUCTION, AND SANITATION DISTRICTS

law.text: After the creation of a construction district under the provisions of KRS 76.241 to 76.246, the board may, if the board deem it feasible, instead of issuing bonds as provided in KRS 76.253, issue apportionment warrants, using the procedures after assessment set out in KRS 184.150 to 184.250, "road district" being read as "metropolitan sewer district," "board of directors" being read as "metropolitan sewer district board" and the reference to roads being read as reference to sewers and drains including treatment plants.
